name: John Smith
bio: John specializes in strength training, powerlifting, and building muscle mass. He has trained professional athletes and beginners alike.

name: Lisa Thompson
bio: Lisa helps clients improve flexibility, posture, and mental well-being through yoga and mobility training.

name: Michael Johnson
bio: Michael has helped hundreds of clients achieve their weight loss and fitness goals with personalized training plans and nutrition guidance.

name: Sophia Martinez
bio: Sophia specializes in high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and functional workouts, helping clients increase endurance and agility.

name: David Brown
bio: David is a professional bodybuilder and nutritionist who helps clients build lean muscle and optimize their diet for peak performance.
